plot: Two toys discarded from a factory production line. Coming to life, they chase the factory delivery van in the hope of rejoining their friends.
title: Macropolis
plot_es: Two toys discarded from a factory production line. Coming to life, they chase the factory delivery van in the hope of rejoining their friends.
plot_en: Two toys discarded from a factory production line. Coming to life, they chase the factory delivery van in the hope of rejoining their friends.
